name: Impulse Arena
description:
Alpha 1.0

Impulse Arena is a fast-paced deathmatch platformer for two to four players. Master the pulse-pack to outmaneuver your opponents and deliver the killing blow.

Currently, there is no single-player or networked multiplayer mode, so at least one controller is required to play the game. I recommend an Xbox 360 controller.

This is an open alpha of the game, so any and all feedback is much appreciated (divforgegames@gmail.com).

Controls

Move - WASD or Left Analog Stick

Dash - Space or Left Bumper

Aim - Mouse or Right Analog Stick

Shoot - Left-click or Right Trigger

Credits

Game by David Ford.
